hotels.title: Glamorous Boston Langham Retreat in the Heart of the City with Italian Restaurant & Chic Bar
hotels.description: Bostonian elegance of the highest degree awaits at the lavish five-star Langham Hotel, Boston - perfectly positioned in the heart of the city. This historic hotel, once the Federal Reserve Bank, is a stone's throw from the iconic Freedom Trail, the city's sparkling harbour and the bustling shops of Newbury Street. Dine on Italian family-style dishes in the grand hall of Grana, or relax with a New England concoction in hand at The Fed cocktail bar.

hotels.title: Boston Heritage Hotel Near Freedom Trail with Renowned Restaurant & Two Bars
hotels.description: Get lost in Boston's illustrious history at this charming heritage hotel boasting cosy vintage-style interiors. Savour culinary delights at Parker's Restaurant, the birthplace of the Boston Cream Pie, or sip on a wine or cocktail at elegant Parker's Bar or The Last Hurrah, a classic American bar. Venture out to explore the Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall Marketplace, or the nearby Theatre District before retreating to the onsite fitness centre or the comfort of your elegantly appointed room or suite.

hotels.vendor_name: Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport
hotels.title: Sophisticated Boston Seaport Escape with Rooftop Pool, Six Onsite Restaurants & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Delve into the heart of Boston's vibrant Seaport District from the comfort of your elegant city oasis, perfectly positioned within easy reach of the city's top cultural attractions. Boasting stylish and well-appointed rooms, relax and unwind while soaking up unrivalled city and harbour vistas from the floor-to-ceiling windows. Indulge in unique dining experiences across the hotel's six restaurants and bars which offer a range of Mediterranean-American fare, Capri-style pizzas or French speciality coffee and sip on global cocktails at the lively sports-themed bar. For relaxation, retreat to the tranquil spa or take a dip in the sun-soaked rooftop pool.
